name: Bladed Dash, Greater
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like bladed dash, save that you can make a single melee attack against every creature you pass during the 30 feet of your dash. You cannot attack an individual creature more than once with spell.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同飞刃袭一般，不过你能够对30尺冲刺距离内经过的每一名生物进行单次近战攻击。你不能使用该法术对某个特定的生物进行一次以上的攻击。
